item.title: My GoodReal
item.description: Type SaaS product in real estate industry (Desktop) Time September 2020 - March 2021 Skills Scrum / Interview / User Journey Tools Sketch Design Context My GoodReal is a platform designed to enable real estate brokers to create and customize their own websites. By connecting with MLSÂ® Listings, it allows brokers to showcase their properties directly on their site, and also includes CRM and other functionalities. Many brokers lack experience in website design, set up domain, and server management.
